amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to invest in surface transportation projects.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 729 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 729 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Cardin. (consideration: CR S1980; text: CR S1980) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to invest in surface transportation projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 729 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Cardin.
